BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no.040252 PQQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the acquisition of real property located at 197-14 119th Avenue, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 27, for use as a agency operated boarding home. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
